availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Peter Banta and Rachel Banta. Married to Cassandra Demaree. Farmer in Henry County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Pleasureville post office, p. 137.
Find A Grave, Entry for Isaac Banta (1809-1881), Find A Grave Memorial # 68338944, Dutch Tract Cemetery, North Pleasureville, Henry County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=68338944 (accessed 14 Jun 2017).
